name: vibe-da-ibm-cloud
label: Vibe Code Landing Zone
description: Deploy a full-stack vibe-coding environment that instantly spins up IBM Cloud Object Storage (Lite) with a static-site IDE.

variables.name: resource_group
variables.label: Resource Group
variables.description: Name of your IBM Cloud resource group.

outputs.name: vibe_bucket_crn
outputs.label: Vibe Bucket CRN
outputs.description: Cloud Object Storage bucket unique identifier.

outputs.name: push_cos_url
outputs.label: Push to COS URL
outputs.description: IBM Cloud Function endpoint for pushing updates to your bucket.

outputs.name: push_project_url
outputs.label: Push to Project URL
outputs.description: IBM Cloud Function endpoint for updating your project (primary output).
